name: wonShot
description:
Its your first day of work at the Galactic Federation of Several Planets. Your job is to destroy as many enemy ships as possible with your giant laser, but there is one thing we didn't mention in orientation; due to budget cuts the laser only fires once per day. Also, if you can't meet a minimum quota you will be terminated. Travel through the galaxy destroying the rebel army one shot at a time in wonShot!

Features:

- 100 playable levels.

- A hilariously dry narrative.

- Various power-ups and bonus objects scattered throughout each level.

- Unique character portraits for NPC characters who guide you through the campaign

- Neat Voxel art ships

- Explosions!
